name: caveEntrance
Perc_SUCC: You spot four giant rats in a hallway that leads deeper into the cavern.
Invest_SUCC: You spot a small trail of food crumbs, cheese, salted pork leading deeper into the cavern.
Perc_FAIL: You don't see anything of value
Surv_FAIL: No use for this right now
Arc_FAIL: You don't sense any specific magic
roomDesc: This tunnel is the main entrance into the Rat King's domain. His rat minions bring in the food they forage from outside through here.
